price: Bazoba bari mu mirima itotahaye yo mu Bwami bw’ijuru rya “Adeni”, ari na Bwo Nyenimpuhwe Allah Yasezeraniye abaja bayo ko bazobwinjira, bakabwemera bataranabubona n’amaso. Mu vy’ukuri, isezerano rya Nyenimpuhwe Allah, ritegerezwa gushika.
arabic: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا

meta.transliteration: jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿada al-raḥmānu ʿibādahu bil-ghaybi innahu kāna waʿduhu matiyyan
